concepts.title: What is Coding?
concepts.description: Understand the basics of coding, why it's important, and how it works with real-world examples.

concepts.title: Variables & Data Types
concepts.description: Learn about variables, numbers, strings, and basic data types.

concepts.title: Operators & Expressions
concepts.description: Understand arithmetic, logical, and comparison operators.

concepts.title: Control Flow
concepts.description: Use if, else, elif to control program flow.

concepts.title: Loops
concepts.description: Master for-loops and while-loops for iteration.

concepts.title: Functions
concepts.description: Write reusable code using functions and parameters.

concepts.title: Lists & Tuples
concepts.description: Understand how to use lists and tuples for data storage.

concepts.title: Dictionaries & Sets
concepts.description: Use dictionaries and sets for mapping and unique data.

concepts.title: String Manipulation
concepts.description: Perform operations and formatting on strings.

concepts.title: File Handling
concepts.description: Read from and write to files.

concepts.title: Error Handling
concepts.description: Use try-except blocks to manage errors gracefully.

concepts.title: Modules & Packages
concepts.description: Structure your code with modules and packages.

concepts.title: Object-Oriented Programming
concepts.description: Learn classes, objects, inheritance, and encapsulation.

concepts.title: Working with Libraries
concepts.description: Use standard and third-party libraries (like math, random, datetime).

concepts.title: Basic Algorithms & Problem Solving
concepts.description: Apply programming knowledge to solve simple algorithmic problems.

concepts.title: Arrays and Strings
concepts.description: Learn about linear data structures like arrays and strings.

concepts.title: Linked Lists
concepts.description: Understand how linked lists work and their operations.

concepts.title: Stacks & Queues
concepts.description: Learn about LIFO and FIFO data structures and their use cases.

concepts.title: Recursion
concepts.description: Master the concept of functions calling themselves.

concepts.title: Searching Algorithms
concepts.description: Understand linear and binary search techniques.

concepts.title: Sorting Algorithms
concepts.description: Learn common sorting techniques like bubble, selection, and merge sort.

concepts.title: Hashing
concepts.description: Understand hash maps and sets for efficient lookups.

concepts.title: Trees
concepts.description: Learn about binary trees, traversals, and applications.

concepts.title: Graphs
concepts.description: Understand graphs, BFS, DFS, and shortest path algorithms.

concepts.title: Sliding Window
concepts.description: Optimize subarray problems using the sliding window approach.

concepts.title: Two Pointers
concepts.description: Use two-pointer technique to reduce complexity in sorted arrays.

concepts.title: Fast and Slow Pointers
concepts.description: Detect cycles in linked lists and other clever tricks.

concepts.title: Backtracking
concepts.description: Build all possible solutions recursively and undo steps when needed.

concepts.title: Greedy
concepts.description: Make locally optimal choices to solve global problems.

concepts.title: Divide and Conquer
concepts.description: Split problems into subproblems, solve recursively, then combine.

concepts.title: Dynamic Programming
concepts.description: Store solutions to subproblems to avoid recomputation.

concepts.title: Bit Manipulation
concepts.description: Solve problems using binary operations like XOR, AND, OR.
